title: For You, My Love ğŸ’•
content:
My dearest Tanmai,

This virtual sanctuary was created just for you. Every star in this sky was placed here thinking of you, every floating creature moves with the rhythm of my heart.

You are my universe, my everything. In this space, I hope you feel how much you mean to me.

When you're here, know that my love surrounds you, even across the distance. This is our special place.

Forever yours,
â¤ï¸
